ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Some math on the new xp
ygData.msgSnippet: ... this is exactly correct.  who are the people who benefit the most from this change? the people with the lower exp penalty (or exp bonus) who were
ygData.messageBody:
At 12:32 PM 1/16/01 -0500, you wrote:
>This is my post on the EQvaults forums, thought maybe th ebard community
>would want to see my figures.
>
>Yea its not really that big of a difference. Your shadowknight is not about
>to start leveling 40% faster. (Unless you solo all the time). Some quick
>(and probably not all that accurate) math:

this is exactly correct. who are the people who benefit the most from this change?
the people with the lower exp penalty (or exp bonus) who were shouldering part
of the load of the higher exp penalty from some other classes. so that halfling
warrior your bard groups with will have a much bigger benefit than your bard, but
both will still benefit.
